text:
Justices Amendment Order 2012

I make the following order under section 26(1A) of the Justices Act 1959 .

14 September 2012

NICK MCKIM

Minister for Corrections and Consumer Protection

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Justices Amendment Order 2012 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Principal Order
    In this order, the Justices Order 2004 is referred to as the Principal Order.

4.
    The amendments effected by this clause have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Justices Order 2004 .

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 26 September 2012

This order is administered in the Department of Justice.
